translator
Class EssencePrimeTranslator

java.lang.Object
  translator.EssencePrimeTranslator
All Implemented Interfaces:
TranslatorGlobals
Direct Known Subclasses:
EssencePrimeMinionTranslator
public abstract class EssencePrimeTranslator
extends Object
implements TranslatorGlobals

The abstract class EssencePrimeTranslator takes care of all translation steps that are done independent of the solver we want to translate to. This includes parsing and producing a syntax tree, followed by inserting parameter values, expression evaluation, collecting all decision variables, and simplifying constraints. As a result, a HashMap "decisionVariables" contains all decision variables with their corresponding domain and an ArrayList "decisionVariablesNames" holding all decision variables names. The evaluated and simplified constraints are stored in the ArrayList "constraints". The constructor of the abstract class performs all these solver-independent steps.

Author:
andrea

Method Detail

translate

public abstract String translate(String[] parameters)
                          throws TranslationUnsupportedException,
                                 MinionException,
                                 PreprocessorException,
                                 ClassNotFoundException
Given a HashMap of decision variables with their domains and a list of all constraints, translate to the solver input language. This method includes all translation steps that are solver-dependent.
